Lyric:
[00:17.54]Dance boogie wonderland
[00:24.85]Dance boogie wonderland

[00:32.30]Midnight creeps so slowly into hearts,
[00:36.93]Of men who need more than they get
[00:39.71]Daylight deals a bad hand,
[00:42.50]To a woman that has laid to many bets

[00:47.23]The mirror stares you in the face and says
[00:51.76]"baby, uh uh it don't work"
[00:54.54]You say your prayers through you don't care
[00:58.21]You dance and shake the hurt
[01:01.58]Dance boogie wonderland
[01:08.82]Dance boogie wonderland

[01:16.19]Sound fly through the night
[01:19.13]I chase my vinyl drams to boogie wonderland
[01:24.03]I find romance when i start to dance in boogie wonderland
[01:31.14]I find romance when i start to dance in boogie wonderland

[01:38.46]All the love in the world can't be gone
[01:45.43]All the need to be loved can't be wrong
[01:51.19]All the records are playing
[01:54.65]And my heart keeps saying
[01:56.44]"boogie wonderland, wonderland"
